introduction: A woman sets out to photograph moments of intimacy. On an internet dating site she writes: "I’m looking for people who would like to be photographed in public revealing something of themselves…" What I’m Looking For documents this adventure, as well as the connections formed at the intersection between virtual and actual public space. The video is a rumination on the nature of photography and the persistence of vision. It is a short tale of desire and control.源自：https://www.kasselerdokfest.de/en/screenings/s-a1e60b84-d840-8a4a-8417-b478659d0e48
